verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לְנֹ֔חַ <WH5146> unto Noah בֹּֽא־ <WH935> Come אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> thou and all thy house אֶל־ <WH413> about הַתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> into the ark כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֹתְךָ֥ <WH853> רָאִ֛יתִי <WH7200> for thee have I seen צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> righteous לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before me בַּדּ֥וֹר <WH1755> generation הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> in this

מִכֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> of every הַבְּהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> beast הַטְּהוֹרָ֗ה <WH2889> Of every clean תִּֽקַּח־ <WH3947> thou shalt take לְךָ֛ שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> sevens שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> sevens אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the male וְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> and his female וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַבְּהֵמָ֡ה <WH929> and of beasts אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> after לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not טְהֹרָ֥ה <WH2889> clean הִ֛וא <WH1931> he שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> by two אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> the male וְאִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> and his female

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> also מֵע֧וֹף <WH5775> Of fowls הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> also of the air שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> sevens שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> sevens זָכָ֣ר <WH2145> the male וּנְקֵבָ֑ה <WH5347> and the female לְחַיּ֥וֹת <WH2421> alive זֶ֖רַע <WH2233> seed עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face כָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of all the earth

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לְיָמִ֨ים <WH3117> days ע֜וֹד <WH5750> For yet שִׁבְעָ֗ה <WH7651> seven אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מַמְטִ֣יר <WH4305> and I will cause it to rain עַל־ <WH5921> from off הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> nights וּמָחִ֗יתִי <WH4229> will I destroy אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַיְקוּם֙ <WH3351> living substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> that I have made מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> out פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> the face הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth
וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> did נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> And Noah כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> according unto all that the LORD

וְנֹ֕חַ <WH5146> And Noah בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> [was] six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וְהַמַּבּ֣וּל <WH3999> when the flood הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> came מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of waters עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> was upon the earth

וַיָּ֣בֹא <WH935> went in נֹ֗חַ <WH5146> And Noah וּ֠בָנָיו <WH1121> and his sons וְאִשְׁתּ֧וֹ <WH802> and his wife וּנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives בָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons' אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> about הַתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> with him into the ark מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because of מֵ֥י <WH4325> the waters הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <WH3999> of the flood

מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> beasts הַטְּהוֹרָ֔ה <WH2889> Of clean וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הַ֨בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> and of beasts אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that אֵינֶ֖נָּה <WH369> are not טְהֹרָ֑ה <WH2889> that [are] not clean וּמִ֨ן־ <WH4480> at הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> and of fowls וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> and everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that רֹמֵ֖שׂ <WH7430> and of every thing that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> upon the earth

שְׁנַ֨יִם <WH8147> two שְׁנַ֜יִם <WH8147> and two בָּ֧אוּ <WH935> There went in אֶל־ <WH413> to נֹ֛חַ <WH5146> unto Noah אֶל־ <WH413> into הַתֵּבָ֖ה <WH8392> into the ark זָכָ֣ר <WH2145> the male וּנְקֵבָ֑ה <WH5347> and the female כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> as צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> נֹֽחַ׃ <WH5146> Noah

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came לְשִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> And it came to pass after seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וּמֵ֣י <WH4325> that the waters הַמַּבּ֔וּל <WH3999> of the flood הָי֖וּ <WH1961> came עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> were upon the earth

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> In שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> the six מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> hundredth שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year לְחַיֵּי־ <WH2416> life נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> of Noah's בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> in the second בְּשִׁבְעָֽה־ <WH7651> seven עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen י֖וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> the same נִבְקְעוּ֙ <WH1234> broken up כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעְיְנֹת֙ <WH4599> were all the fountains תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> deep רַבָּ֔ה <WH7227> of the great וַאֲרֻבֹּ֥ת <WH699> and the windows הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven נִפְתָּֽחוּ׃ <WH6605> were opened

וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> fell הַגֶּ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> And the rain עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> was upon the earth אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> and forty לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> nights

בְּעֶ֨צֶם <WH6106> In the selfsame הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> them בָּ֣א <WH935> entered נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> Noah וְשֵׁם־ <WH8035> and Shem וְחָ֥ם <WH2526> and Ham וָיֶ֖פֶת <WH3315> and Japheth בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons נֹ֑חַ <WH5146> of Noah וְאֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife נֹ֗חַ <WH5146> and Noah's וּשְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <WH7969> and the three נְשֵֽׁי־ <WH802> wives בָנָ֛יו <WH1121> of his sons אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> about הַתֵּבָֽה׃ <WH8392> with them into the ark

הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> They וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הַֽחַיָּ֣ה <WH2416> and every beast לְמִינָ֗הּ <WH4327> after his kind וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and all the cattle לְמִינָ֔הּ <WH4327> after their kind וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הָרֶ֛מֶשׂ <WH7431> and every creeping thing הָרֹמֵ֥שׂ <WH7430> that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <WH4327> after his kind וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הָע֣וֹף <WH5775> and every fowl לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <WH4327> after his kind כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all צִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> every bird כָּל־ <WH3605> and every כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> of every sort

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> And they went in אֶל־ <WH413> to נֹ֖חַ <WH5146> unto Noah אֶל־ <WH413> into הַתֵּבָ֑ה <WH8392> into the ark שְׁנַ֤יִם <WH8147> two שְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> of all flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> wherein בּ֖וֹ ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> [is] the breath חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of life

וְהַבָּאִ֗ים <WH935> And they that went in זָכָ֨ר <WH2145> male וּנְקֵבָ֤ה <WH5347> and female מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂר֙ <WH1320> of all flesh בָּ֔אוּ <WH935> went in כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> as God וַיִּסְגֹּ֥ר <WH5462> shut him in יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> him and the LORD בַּֽעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH1157> behind

וַֽיְהִ֧י <WH1961> came הַמַּבּ֛וּל <WH3999> And the flood אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> was forty י֖וֹם <WH3117> days עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> increased הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> and the waters וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <WH5375> and bare up אֶת־ <WH853> הַתֵּבָ֔ה <WH8392> the ark וַתָּ֖רָם <WH7311> and it was lift up מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> above the earth

וַיִּגְבְּר֥וּ <WH1396> prevailed הַמַּ֛יִם <WH4325> And the waters וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <WH7235> and were increased מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> greatly עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> floated הַתֵּבָ֖ה <WH8392> and the ark עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of the waters

וְהַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> And the waters גָּ֥בְר֛וּ <WH1396> prevailed מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> more מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> and more עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וַיְכֻסּ֗וּ <WH3680> were covered כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> hills הַגְּבֹהִ֔ים <WH1364> and all the high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> that [were] under כָּל־ <WH3605> everywhere הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> the whole heaven

חֲמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits מִלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> upward גָּבְר֖וּ <WH1396> prevail הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> did the waters וַיְכֻסּ֖וּ <WH3680> were covered הֶהָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> and the mountains

וַיִּגְוַ֞ע <WH1478> died כָּל־ <WH3605> All בָּשָׂ֣ר ׀ <WH1320> And all flesh הָרֹמֵ֣שׂ <WH7430> that moved עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth בָּע֤וֹף <WH5775> both of fowl וּבַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and of cattle וּבַ֣חַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> and of beast וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> and every הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <WH8318> and of every creeping thing הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <WH8317> that creepeth עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> and every man

כֹּ֡ל <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whose נִשְׁמַת־ <WH5397> was the breath ר֨וּחַ <WH7307> of the spirit חַיִּ֜ים <WH2416> of life בְּאַפָּ֗יו <WH639> All in whose nostrils מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose בֶּחָֽרָבָ֖ה <WH2724> of all that [was] in the dry מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> [land] died

וַיִּ֜מַח <WH4229> was destroyed אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַיְק֣וּם ׀ <WH3351> And every living substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> [alive] and they that עַל־ <WH5921> was upon פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> which was upon the face הָֽאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> of the ground מֵאָדָ֤ם <WH120> both man עַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> and cattle עַד־ <WH5704> against רֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <WH7431> and the creeping things וְעַד־ <WH5704> and to ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וַיִּמָּח֖וּ <WH4229> and they were destroyed מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> from the earth וַיִשָּׁ֧אֶר <WH7604> remained אַךְ־ <WH389> only נֹ֛חַ <WH5146> and Noah וַֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for בַּתֵּבָֽה׃ <WH8392> [were] with him in the ark
וַיִּגְבְּר֥וּ <WH1396> prevailed הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> And the waters עַל־ <WH5921> upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> an hundred יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> days
